sense.gloss: to get absorbed in, to develop a passion for, to devote oneself to, to become obsessed with, to get hooked on
to be elaborate, to be intricate, to be exquisite, to be particular about, to pay great attention to

sdata.j: ↑彼↑↓かれ↓の↑聞↑↓き↓く↑音楽↑↓おんがく↓といったら↑肩↑↓かた↓の|↑凝↑↓こご↓る|ものばかりだ。
sdata.e: He always listens to serious music.

sdata.j: ↑彼↑↓かれ↓は↑何↑↓なに↓かをやり↑出↑↓だ↓すとそれに|↑凝↑↓こご↓る|↑性質↑↓せいしつ↓です。
sdata.e: When he begins to do anything, he devotes himself to it.

sdata.j: ↑彼女↑↓かのじょ↓は↑肩↑↓かた↓が|↑凝↑↓こ↓る|↑本↑↓ほん↓を↑読↑↓よ↓む↑気↑↓き↓にはなれなかった。
sdata.e: She was not in the mood for serious books.
